医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新方法为大脑去甲肾上腺素系统提供了有价值的见解一个国际研究小组对大脑的去甲肾上腺素（NA）系统提供了宝贵的见解，该系统长期以来一直是治疗注意力缺陷/多动症、抑郁症和焦虑症药物的目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/New-method-provides-valuable-insights-into-the-brains-noradrenaline-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/New-method-provides-valuable-insights-into-the-brains-noradrenaline-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ec2cf72-cb80-439f-a069-e4559085a4bd Tue, 24 Oct 2023 12:11:44 -0400 New method provides valuable insights into the brain's noradrenaline system
研究揭示了一些局灶性癫痫儿童大脑嵌合的另一个起源对于大多数人来说，体内的每个细胞都包含相同的遗传信息。然而，有时人们可能有两组或更多组基因不同的细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Study-reveals-an-alternate-origin-of-brain-mosaicism-in-some-children-with-focal-epilepsy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Study-reveals-an-alternate-origin-of-brain-mosaicism-in-some-children-with-focal-epilepsy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6da30d14-d3e3-4f80-981f-05a26bb36813 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 11:54:07 -0400 Study reveals an alternate origin of brain mosaicism in some children with focal epilepsy
高温瑜伽课程可更大程度地减少抑郁症状在一项针对中重度抑郁症成人的随机对照临床试验中，与对照组相比，参加热瑜伽课程的人抑郁症状明显减轻。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Heated-yoga-sessions-linked-to-greater-reductions-in-depressive-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Heated-yoga-sessions-linked-to-greater-reductions-in-depressive-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0563c109-4e5f-4220-9458-b01ceafb13a8 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 11:49:02 -0400 Heated yoga sessions linked to greater reductions in depressive symptoms
革命性方法将蛋白质分析和单细胞研究联系起来以揭示疾病机制将液体活检蛋白质组学与眼部细胞类型的单细胞转录组学相结合。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Revolutionary-approach-links- Protein-analysis-and-single-cell-study-to-uncover-disease-mechanisms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Revolutionary-approach-links- Protein-analysis-and-single-cell-study-to-uncover-disease-mechanisms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be3bd326-d6d3-429d-beff-4aa253c4e9f8 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 10:49:00 -0400 Revolutionary approach links protein analysis and single-cell study to uncover disease mechanisms
研究揭示混合免疫和加强疫苗接种对抗体减弱的影响COVID-19 疫苗接种后中和抗体 (nAb) 滴度下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Study-reveals-impact-of-hybrid-immunity-and-booster-vaccination-on-antibody-waning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Study-reveals-impact-of-hybrid-immunity-and-booster-vaccination-on-antibody-waning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef583ce8-4038-4334-b268-a1dadb82165d Tue, 24 Oct 2023 10:27:00 -0400 Study reveals impact of hybrid immunity and booster vaccination on antibody waning
利用生物标志物预防、诊断和治疗癌症在这次采访中，义翘神州的 Grace Liu 讨论了生物标志物在癌症预防和诊断中的关键作用，以及它们如何帮助指导治疗决策。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Utilizing-Biomarkers-in-Cancer-Prevention-Diagnosis-and-Treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Utilizing-Biomarkers-in-Cancer-Prevention-Diagnosis-and-Treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fde2455d-396e-4079-ba8a-324c6e770ab8 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 10:07:00 -0400 Utilizing Biomarkers in Cancer Prevention, Diagnosis, and Treatment
基因组监测可以帮助检测和减缓致命“超级细菌”的传播澳大利亚的一项新研究表明，利用基因组监测技术的新进展可以帮助检测致命“超级细菌”的崛起并减缓其进化和传播，从而改善全球健康状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Genomic-surveillance-could-help-detect-and-slow-the-spread-of-deadly-superbugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Genomic-surveillance-could-help-detect-and-slow-the-spread-of-deadly-superbugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eef68d59-472c-4cf1-ba17-9e78dc81a2e8 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 09:58:00 -0400 Genomic surveillance could help detect and slow the spread of deadly 'superbugs'
人工智能心电图工具支持心脏病检测研究人员开发、训练和测试了三个独立的人工智能模型来诊断动脉粥样硬化性心血管疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/AI-powered-ECG-tool-supports-the-detection-of-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/AI-powered-ECG-tool-supports-the-detection-of-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88ce593d-4f17-48b6-9e88-45dcae79a179 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 09:56:00 -0400 AI-powered ECG tool supports the detection of heart disease

凋亡细胞在毛囊退化中发挥关键作用2023 年 10 月 19 日，Oncotarget 第 14 卷发表了一篇新的研究论文，题为“凋亡细胞可能在退化周期中驱动毛囊细胞死亡”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Apoptotic-cells-play-key-role-in-hair-follicle-regression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Apoptotic-cells-play-key-role-in-hair-follicle-regression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6380558f-4b7d-4bf4-acc7-3f8f1860111f Tue, 24 Oct 2023 09:36:00 -0400 Apoptotic cells play key role in hair follicle regression
